statusHistory.description: Bluejam Pirates operate in Gray Terminal area

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Capture the Three Brothers
keyMoments.description: The Bluejam Pirates successfully capture Sabo, Ace, and Luffy, revealing they were hired by Outlook III for this purpose.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew being used as tools by the nobles to enforce their will and control over the lower classes.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Hired to Burn Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that the Bluejam Pirates have been contracted by the nobles to execute the plan to burn down Gray Terminal and everyone in it.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew as instruments of the nobles' genocidal plot, showing how the powerful use criminals as disposable tools to maintain their system.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Prepare the Gray Terminal Fire
keyMoments.description: The Bluejam Pirates, using Ace and Luffy as unwitting helpers, distribute explosives and oil throughout Gray Terminal in preparation for the fire.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew actively setting up the massacre while manipulating children to help them, demonstrating their complete moral bankruptcy.

crewGoals.description: Bluejam desires to become a noble of Goa Kingdom and has been promised this in exchange for burning Gray Terminal

significance: The Bluejam Pirates represent how the nobility manipulates and uses criminal elements to do their dirty work while maintaining their own facade of legitimacy. Despite being pirates, they serve as enforcers of the establishment's cruelest policies. Their desire for noble status shows how the promise of class mobility can be used to manipulate even criminals into committing atrocities.
